law.catch_line: The State may recover State grant funds if, within 15 years after completion of a project:...

text.section:
The State may recover State grant funds if, within 15 years after completion of a project:
the project's property ceases to be operated as a senior citizen activities center; or
an interest in property for which funds have been paid under the Program is assigned, transferred, or conveyed:
without approval by the Board of Public Works; or
for use other than as a senior citizen activities center.

The State is entitled to recover the sum of:
an amount that equals the value of the project property at the time of the recovery multiplied by a fraction:
the numerator of which is the amount of the State funds for the project; and
the denominator of which is the total cost of all eligible work for the project; and
costs, including reasonable attorneys' fees that the State incurs in recovery proceedings.
